pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple 'WebDAV' Client // A simple 'WebDAV' client that provides functions to fetch and send files or folders to servers using the 'WebDAV' protocol (see 'RFC' 4918 https://www.rfc- editor.org/rfc/rfc4918). Only a subset of the protocol is implemented (e.g. file locks are not yet supported).
